description: Detects when trans identities are erased through stereotypes, conflations, or deliberate misframing in media and culture.
patterns: Confusing trans identity with drag, performance, or disguise without consent
Stereotypical depictions reducing trans lives to deception or danger
Exclusion of non-Western gender traditions from mainstream recognition
examples: Media portraying trans women as predatory or deceptive
Erasure of Two-Spirit or Hijra traditions by framing them as 'oddities'
consequence: Shapes public perception toward erasure of trans realities and lived experiences.
